This is my li̶f̶e̶ site now!

May 10, 2016 by Devashish Purandare

I have migrated my flashy homepage to this lousy blog. I hope to give it a professional look now. The color scheme does not hint at anything. Over the next few months, now that I will be mostly free, I will update this site more frequently. Feel free to check out the pages linked in the top bar. I have added a host of things including emoji support!

Now with Math support!! \( a^{2} +b^{2} = c^{2} \)

I am not a web developer, nor do I plan to be so it makes sense for me to ditch that flashy nodejs thing which is like it is because I couldn’t figure out a way to change it. Feel free to contact me for any suggestions.

P.S. My digitalocean subscription ending in August has absolutely NOTHING to do with this and I deny all charges !!
